feed.title: Combined summary - Lightning network implementation with ethereum

entry.title: Combined summary - Lightning network implementation with ethereum
entry.summary: Mahesh has requested technical guidance related to Ethereum implementation from experts. However, the context provided is short and lacks details. Christian stated in response to an inquiry by Mahesh Govind on the Lightning-dev mailing list that there is currently no working implementation for Ethereum. Raiden network has tried to port a Lightning-like network to Ethereum, but it is uncertain what the current status of that project is. Despite the differences in the underlying blockchain, a Lightning-like network is still feasible for Ethereum.
